mapper.select: select l.cyl,s.sph, m.`mfrsname`,b.`brandname`,u.`unitname`, y.`id`,y.`produc_num`,y.`produc_code`,y.`produc_name`,y.`mfrsid`,y.`brandid`,y.`brandnum`,y.`proid`,y.`unitid`,y.`sph_id`,y.`cyl_id`,y.`curvature`,y.`diameter`,y.`factory`, y.`usage_id`,y.`type_id`,y.`use_days`,y.`upday`,y.`downday`,y.`color`,y.`invisible_id`,y.`caizhi_id`,y.`tax`,y.`tax_price`,y.`trade_price`,y.`transfer_price`, y.`retail_price`,y.`xsstate`,y.`state`,y.`classtype` from aa_yxcp y left join c_mfrs m on y.mfrsid=m.mfrsnum left join c_brand b on y.brandnum=b.brandnum and y.mfrsid=b.mfrsid left join c_unit u on y.unitid= u.unitid left join a_cyl l on l.cyl_id=y.cyl_id left join a_sph s on s.sph_id=y.sph_id where y.id = #{value}
